titleStmt.title: A curious collection of paintings, this present Wednesday the 23th. of this instant March, at four of the clock in the afternoon, will be continued the sale by auction of a curious collection of pictures, with an addition of more pieces very extraordinary fine, with tables, stands and other curiosities, at the Outropers-Office in the west-end of the Royal Exchange, which are there exposed to publick view The conditions of sale. ... Catalogues whereof are to be had at the said office.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
